cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (ACST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (ACST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: well equipped with basic hotel amenities such as air conditioning, unlimited Wi-Fi, a television programmed with a variety of channels, bar fridge and a private ensuite. Our friendly team is committed 24*7 to ensure you have a comfortable stay.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (ACST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (ACST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
